section.title: Test Steps
section.p: Ordered list of Actions against the SUT with Validation of responses.
Each Test Step can have a number of Verify Steps, displaying the expected outcomes for that Test Step.

section.title: Test Case Details
section.p: Displays the details of the currently selected Test Case.

section.title: Test Case Result
section.p: Assign a result to this Test Case Execution.
'Result': Select a result from the dropdown list. This field cannot be null.
'Comment': Add a comment for additional information if needed.
'Execution Time': Add the duration of the test case (HH:MM:SS) [Optional].
'KPI Measurement': Open field used to add measurement information for the test execution. [Optional].
'Improvement Story ID(s)': Add User Stories or Improvements that have been planned to improve this test case result. This field is not available where 'Result' is 'Pass'.
'Defect ID(s)': Add the Defect Id(s) that caused the Test Execution not to Pass. This field is not available where 'Result' is 'Pass'.

section.title: Pass/Fail Icons
section.p: An overall result for each Test Step can be assigned by clicking the Pass or Fail icon.

section.title: Actual Result
section.p: Add the result that occurred for each verify step if required. This can be compared against the expected result from the corresponding 'Verify Step'.
